snippet: The Lede is following developments in the day-long testimony on Thursday of Prime Minister David Cameron at a British judicial inquiry into the media standards and the behavior of the press.
abstract: The Lede is following developments in the day-long testimony on Thursday of Prime Minister David Cameron at a British judicial inquiry into the media standards and the behavior of the press.

byline.original: By RAVI SOMAIYA and J. DAVID GOODMAN

headline.main: Updates on Cameron Testimony to British Inquiry
